synopsis.text: Nate's beloved Yo-kai Watch is stolen by the nefarious Kin and Gin, who are working for the wicked Dame Dedtime, sparking a thrilling adventure that transcends time! In this movie, familiar faces from the TV anime series and new Youkai from the upcoming Youkai Watch 2 games make special appearances. When Nate finds himself in a dire situation, the heroic Yo-kai Hovernyan comes to his aid, taking Nate, Whisper, and Jibanyan on a journey back in time to when the first Yo-kai Watch was invented by Nate's own grandfather, Nathaniel, as a young boy. Together, the duo battles against Dame Dedtime and her minions to protect the bond between humans and Yo-kai and save the world from her sinister plans. Join Nate, Hovernyan, and Nathaniel as they uncover the secret origin of the Yo-kai Watch and race against time to save humanity!
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
